Keywords: Brute , Enforcers , Maggia , Sinister Syndicate
Real Name: Joseph
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: This character can move through Blocking terrain. Immediately after movement resolves, destroy all Blocking terrain moved through.
YET ANOTHER SINISTER SIX: When an adjacent friendly character with the Sinister Syndicate keyword begins a move, they can use [Improved Movement: This character can move through Blocking terrain. Immediately after movement resolves, destroy all Blocking terrain moved through.] during that move.
STRAIGHT TO THE TOP, HEAD FIRST: Charge. When he uses it, modify damage +1.

March 15, 2021
Redrover454
With new CCE this guy is DEADLY. 6 square move-and-attack with the sidestep, improved destroy blocking is always useful, and with a light object he's swinging 11/6!! Pair him with a high attack wildcard or Sinister Syndicate and swing with a 12 or 13 attack to really make your opponent mad. He'll be KO'ing characters that are more than twice his point value! A must have for your Syndicate teams.
